author: agemanning
content:
We (currently) allow peers that don't use BlocksByRange and BlocksByRoot. 

I agree that having gossip-only is nice. Potentially we can allow that. I'm finding in the testnets that there are quite a few peers. Often when we connect to new nodes they already have too many peers. 
If the number of peers we connect to is limited, a slot in the connected peer pool is somewhat a valuable resource. From a client perspective, a peer that supports RPC would be more valuable than one that supports gossip only (greater stability for staying head). 
Without too much thought, I'd imagine that gossip-only peers would often be disconnected in favour or non-gossip-only peers.
